app.general.readStatus.title: Read Status Label
app.general.readStatus.description: Used to indicate that an item has been read.

app.general.unreadStatus.title: Unread Status Label
app.general.unreadStatus.description: Used to indicate that an item has not been read.

app.general.searchPlaceholder.title: Search Placeholder
app.general.searchPlaceholder.description: Used as a placeholder in search boxes.

app.general.date.title: Day Indicator
app.general.date.description: Used to indicate which day (out of the total 47) the user is on. The # symbol is dynamically replaced with the correct number.

app.general.confirmButton.title: Confirm Button Label
app.general.confirmButton.description: Gives users the option to confirm an action.

app.general.cancelButton.title: Cancel Button Label
app.general.cancelButton.description: Gives users the option to cancel an action.

app.countdown.daysRemaining.title: Countdown Days Remaining Label
app.countdown.daysRemaining.description: Indicates the number of days remaining in the countdown. This label automatically replaces # with the correct number of days.

app.countdown.description.title: Countdown Description
app.countdown.description.description: Descriptive text on the 'countdown' page to help users understand the purpose of the app, and what they can do. This only appears during the countdown period.
app.countdown.description.default: This app is designed to help you reflect and pray daily during the Lent season. Each day, you'll get one scripture, one devotion, one story, and one prayer. The first day starts on March 6, 2019.

app.countdown.explore.title: Countdown Explore Content Button
app.countdown.explore.description: A button on the Countdown page. When tapped, users are taken to the list of all days.

app.countdown.invite.title: Countdown Invite Friends Button
app.countdown.invite.description: A button on the Countdown page. When tapped, users are able to share a link with friends, inviting them to use the app.

app.countdown.invitationText.title: Countdown Invitation Text
app.countdown.invitationText.description: Default text sent to friends inviting them to try the app.
app.countdown.invitationText.default: Engage with the Lord through this daily Lent reading app, designed by Hong Kong churches for Hong Kong churches!

app.countdown.learnmore.title: Countdown Learn More Button
app.countdown.learnmore.description: A button on the Countdown page. When tapped, users are taken to the Learn More page.

app.branding.oneword.title: One Word Branding
app.branding.oneword.description: Literal translation for 'One Word'. Used as part of general app branding.

app.branding.onechurch.title: One Church Branding
app.branding.onechurch.description: Literal translation for 'One Church'. Used as part of general app branding.

app.branding.onecity.title: One City Branding
app.branding.onecity.description: Literal translation for 'One City'. Used as part of general app branding.

app.branding.onelord.title: One Lord Branding
app.branding.onelord.description: Literal translation for 'One Lord'. Used as part of general app branding.

app.content.playAllButton.title: Play All Button
app.content.playAllButton.description: The button label to play all audio.

app.content.readingsTitle.title: Daily Title for Readings
app.content.readingsTitle.description: The title of the Readings section of the daily content.

app.content.devotionalTitle.title: Daily Title for Devotional
app.content.devotionalTitle.description: The title of the Devotional section of the daily content.

app.content.prayerTitle.title: Daily Title for Prayer
app.content.prayerTitle.description: The title of the Prayer section of the daily content.

app.content.videoTitle.title: Daily Title for Video
app.content.videoTitle.description: The title of the Video section of the daily content.

app.bible.remoteBible.title: Bible.is Button Label
app.bible.remoteBible.description: A button users can press to open the current Bible reading on Bible.is

app.bible.audioCopyright.title: Bible Audio Copyright Label
app.bible.audioCopyright.description: Displayed before Bible audio copyright info.

app.bible.textCopyright.title: Bible Text Copyright Label
app.bible.textCopyright.description: Displayed before Bible text copyright info.

app.welcome.introLanguage.title: Select Language Instruction
app.welcome.introLanguage.description: Welcomes users to the app, and asks them to select a language.
app.welcome.introLanguage.default: Welcome to the One App. This app is designed to help you reflect and pray daily during the Lent season. Please select a language to start.

app.welcome.introChurch.title: Select Church Instruction
app.welcome.introChurch.description: Helps users understand why they are asked to select a church.
app.welcome.introChurch.default: Please indicate which church you attend (if any).

app.welcome.otherChurch.title: Other/None Church Label
app.welcome.otherChurch.description: A default value for users to choose if their church is not listed.

app.audio.unsupportedDevice.title: Audio Unsupported Warning
app.audio.unsupportedDevice.description: A warning shown to users when their device doesn't support the available audio format.
app.audio.unsupportedDevice.default: Your device does not support this audio format.

app.today.title.title: Today Tab Label
app.today.title.description: Title of the Today tab, which jumps to the current day's readings.

app.home.title.title: Home Tab Label
app.home.title.description: Title of the Home tab, which jumps to the home view (before and after the campaign)

app.list.title.title: All Tab Label
app.list.title.description: Title of the All tab, which lists all days in the reading plan.

app.settings.language.title: Language Settings Title
app.settings.language.description: Title of the Language Settings page

app.settings.church.title: Church Settings Title
app.settings.church.description: Title of the Select Church Settings page

app.settings.notifications.title: Notification Settings Title
app.settings.notifications.description: Title of the Notification Settings page

app.settings.enableNotifications.title: Enable Notifications Button
app.settings.enableNotifications.description: Button users press to enable app notifications.

app.settings.disableNotifications.title: Disable Notifications Button
app.settings.disableNotifications.description: Button users press to disable app notifications.

app.settings.aboutDescription.title: About Page Description
app.settings.aboutDescription.description: Description text at the top of the about page
app.settings.aboutDescription.default:
Faith Comes By Hearing and Hong Kong Evangelical Fellowship initiate this campaign to express the unity of believers around Hong Kong under the Word of God. We are One Church and there is only One Body of Christ. Together, in Hong Kong, we will listen to His Word; starting with Luke: his Gospel story as he tells us about the life and ministry of Jesus Christ; and then the Book of Acts, as the early believers shared the good news of Jesus to the world around them. 
 We know that our Lord will be delighted when the Body of Christ is united. As we participate to listen and meditate on the Word of God together, we trust that hearts will be ignited and there will be a revival as we are reminded of our call to be witnesses to the end of the world. The Word of God is powerful, sharper than a two-edged sword; there will be restoration and transformation of hearts and lives. 
We believe at the end of the 47 days' campaign, as the Word of God abides in our hearts, we will be ready to partner and help the Church to grow to a new season of fruitfulness.

app.settings.reset.title: Reset Button Label
app.settings.reset.description: Button users press to initiate an app reset.

app.settings.resetConfirmation.title: Reset Confirmation Label
app.settings.resetConfirmation.description: Message shown to users confirming they wish to reset the app settings.
app.settings.resetConfirmation.default: Are you sure you wish to reset the app?  All settings and data will be removed.

app.settings.partnersListTitle.title: Partners List Title
app.settings.partnersListTitle.description: A message shown to users above the partners list

app.completed.title.title: Completed Title
app.completed.title.description: A title to show users when the campaign is finished

app.completed.description.title: Completed Description
app.completed.description.description: A message to show users when the campaign is finished (appears below the title)
app.completed.description.default: Thank you for using this app. The Lent campaign is now finished. Visit the link below to learn more.

app.completed.actionLabel.title: Completed Action Label
app.completed.actionLabel.description: A button label that users can click on when the campaign is finished.

app.news.title.title: News Tab Label
app.news.title.description: Title of the News tab, which displays news about the ONE campaign

app.news.placeholder.title: News Tab Placeholder
app.news.placeholder.description: Placeholder text displayed when no news about the ONE campaign is available in this language.
app.news.placeholder.default: News about the ONE Hearing the Word campaign will appear here soon.

app.general.markAllAsUnread.title: Mark All As Read
app.general.markAllAsUnread.description: Label of the Mark All As Read button

app.content.specialPrayerTitle.title: Pray HK: ONE minute @ ONE pm
app.content.specialPrayerTitle.default: Pray HK: ONE minute @ ONE pm

app.content.specialPrayerHeader.title: Special Prayer Header
app.content.specialPrayerHeader.default: Together we shall lift our voice in unity to the Lord!

app.testimonies.placeholder.title: Testimonies Placeholder
app.testimonies.placeholder.description: Placeholder text displayed when no testimonies are available in this language.
